name: nonbiological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not connected with the natural processes of living things: The fluid contains a combination of nonbiological materials. One research group has produced similar crystals using non-biological techniques.
[ before noun ] not related by birth: In some cases, courts will award custody of children to nonbiological parents. She still has a good relationship with her non-biological daughter.
UK Nonbiological washing powder or liquid does not use enzymes (= substances that cause chemical change) to remove dirt: This mild, nonbiological washing powderlaundry detergent is made from natural ingredients. Using a non-biological washing powder can help to reduce itchiness.
